For me, the plusses, led by the extraordinary choreography (danced by one of the finest ensembles ever assembled for Broadway), donâ€™t outweigh the minuses, especially the thin plot and often nonsensical lyrics...As for those performers, they are a slightly mixed litter...We could do worse (and better) than this one."
